title: Icon
description: An icon which can communicate the action that it is going to initiate. Users can click on the icon to begin a process or workflow, or to trigger an action.

Visible.description: Sets the visibility of the control.

OnPress.description: Action/Rule to be executed when the icon is clicked. The ClientAPI object to be received in rule function is [SectionProxy](../../../apidoc/classes/sectionproxy.md).

Icon.description: Icon to be displayed in the section header.
The string value is a style class name of `Icon`.
